General.Name: Guangdong Fuxin Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guangdong Fuxin Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells semiconductor thermoelectric materials. It also offers thermoelectric components, thermoelectric systems, semiconductor thermoelectric technology application products, thermoelectric conversion energy products, electronic products and their accessories, and medical devices, as well as semiconductor thermoelectric technology services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Foshan, China.
